channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Hate VAR? Wait until you see how FIFA plans to use AI at the World Cup
item.description: The FIFA World Cup 2026 is getting even more VAR as an AI-powered ball helps add corner kick scrutiny.

item.title: Ce radar vélo 2-en-1 avec éclairage veut rivaliser avec les références Garmin
item.description: Associant un radar détectant 8 véhicules jusqu’à 140 mètres, un éclairage visible à 500 mètres et une double connectivité GPS-appli, le Sigma RECO 81 Link veut être l’allié des cyclistes au guidon de leurs vélos de route.

item.title: 01net Awards 2025 : les grands gagnants
item.description: Découvrez tous les lauréats de l'édition 2025 des 01net Awards. Cet article est mis à jour tous les jours jusqu'au 10 décembre.

item.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A’s DLC is almost here, and the first ‘Z Mega Evolution’ has been confirmed
item.description: Game Freak has released a new trailer for Pokémon Legends: Z-A - Mega Dimension, confirming that the expansion will feature a new type of Mega Evolution.

item.title: Philips Hue veut illuminer votre Noël avec ce pack complet à -50 %, parfait pour créer une ambiance cosy
item.description: Ce bundle Philips Hue a tout du kit de départ parfait : les ampoules, les barres Hue Play et surtout le Hue Bridge, le cerveau de l’écosystème. Un pack complet, prêt à fonctionner dès la sortie de la boîte, et qui surtout fond de moitié sur la Fnac : 149,99 euros au lieu de 289,99 euros.

item.title: This $25 Pair of See-Through Headphones Is God-Tier ’90s Nostalgia
item.description: Screw AirPods Max.

item.title: J’ai vu le Huawei Mate X7 et c’est très frustrant
item.description: Voici quelques photos que j'ai pu prendre du Huawei Mate X7 en Chine. Un smartphone qui donne très envie et c'est d'autant plus frustrant.

item.title: Your ChatGPT chats could be less private than you thought – here’s what a new OpenAI court ruling means for you
item.description: OpenAI is being ordered to hand over ChatGPT data. This new legal ruling could set a major precedent for how your AI chats are handled.

item.title: Shredded cheese recall update: Great Lakes Cheese responds to FDA report on metal fragments in products
item.description: A recall issued in October is only now getting media attention. The company says impacted products have been removed from shelves. Headlines about a shredded cheese recall affecting more than a quarter of a million cases of various products have been making the rounds for the last few days, understandably alarming consumers.

item.title: Pourquoi vous allez bientôt croiser des voitures dotées de plaques rose en France
item.description: Pour éviter la fraude aux immatriculations temporaires ou de garage, l'État a décidé de durcir les règles. Il n'y a pas de changement de réglementation à proprement parler, mais simplement une plaque plus reconnaissable pour faciliter les contrôles des forces de l'ordre. Voici les plaques à fond rose.

item.title: Apple Final Cut Pro (2025) review
item.description: Final Cut Pro 11.2 delivers powerful new features - but can feel like Apple's playing catch up.

item.title: 01net Awards : la meilleure montre de sport de l’année est…
item.description: La rédaction de 01net.com désigne les meilleurs produits de l’année. Découvrez tous les jours les vainqueurs de chaque catégorie jusqu’à la remise des prix le 10 décembre, en live s’il vous plait !

item.title: AI is ushering in a new era for the diagnosis and treatment of vision loss
item.description: Tools powered by artificial intelligence can now be used to provide a continuum of care, according to experts who spoke at the recent WCI Summit. Artificial intelligence is radically changing how healthcare providers tackle vision loss, with tools that can be used from diagnosis to treatment and even follow-up care.

item.title: A Startup Says It Has Found a Hidden Source of Geothermal Energy
item.description: Zanskar uses AI to identify hidden geothermal systems—and claims it has found one that could fuel a power plant, the first such discovery by industry in decades.

item.title: Why new Christmas movies don’t hit the same (yet)
item.description: A look at why Christmas movies feel so comforting — from nostalgia and repetition to the way they shape our holiday memories.

item.title: Google wants to help businesses build AI agents with no prior experience
item.description: Any business can now build its own AI agents with natural-language prompts, powered by Gemini 3.

item.title: These are the 10 best Chrome extensions of 2025, according to Google – and there’s one I definitely recommend
item.description: These are Google's favorite Chrome extensions of the year, and there's a running theme.

item.title: Score Sonys WH-CH520 headphones for under $40 right now at Amazon
item.description: As of Dec. 4, the Sony WH-CH520 headphones are down to $38 at Amazon, a 46% discount from their list price of $69.99.

item.title: The EU is probing Meta over WhatsApp’s AI chatbot restrictions
item.description: The European Union has launched a formal investigation into Meta over antitrust concerns with AI restrictions in WhatsApp. The probe aims to “prevent any possible irreparable harm to competition in the AI space” according to the EU, and follows Meta announcing changes to WhatsApp’s terms for businesses in October that will prohibit companies from using […]...

item.title: Google Photos s’offre un bilan 2025 façon Spotify Wrapped grâce à Gemini
item.description: En intégrant Google Gemini, Google Photos se dote d'un récap de l'année 2025 plus personnalisable. Les utilisateurs vont pouvoir choisir avec précision les moments et les visages qu'ils souhaitent voir apparaître.

item.title: Kalshi CEO Says He Wants to Monetize ‘Any Difference in Opinion’
item.description: Now if that isn't late-stage capitalism, I don't know what is.

item.title: Prince Harry crashes Stephen Colberts late show to audition for a Hallmark movie
item.description: Stephen Colbert's holiday Hallmark movie segment on "The Late Show" featured a surprise cameo from Prince Harry.

item.title: On a rarement vu un laptop gaming de 16″ avec une RTX 5070 à ce prix, merci Amazon
item.description: Le Black Friday a beau être terminé, les promotions continuent avec le Gigabyte Gaming A16 CWH avec une RTX 5070 affiché à 1 169,98 euros au lieu de 1 499 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: The 41 best Apple TV shows, ranked
item.description: Not sure exactly what's on Apple's streaming service? We're here to help with our picks of the best TV shows on Apple TV+.

item.title: 15 tiny habits that compound into major productivity gains
item.description: Experts share their most effective secrets. Small changes in routines can create significant improvements in how much gets accomplished in a day. Here, experts share 15 practical habits that can boost productivity and lead to better results in your work and personal life.

item.title: Xbox Wireless Controllers make surprisingly great stocking fillers, especially so with these Amazon discounts
item.description: The best time to buy an Xbox Wireless Controller for Christmas is now – save up to 38%.

item.title: The iPhone 17 Pro has just lost a key camera feature, and Apple won’t explain why
item.description: The iPhone 17 Pro’s camera can no longer use Night mode and Portrait mode together.

item.title: Prime Video releases first explosive posters for The Boys season 5 – and a release date and trailer are going to be next
item.description: Amazon has unveiled the first official artwork for The Boys' fifth and final season.

item.title: ‘Mutant Mayhem 2’ Director Confirms New Film Won’t Impact the Sequel
item.description: Jeff Rowe, director of 'Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem' and its upcoming sequel, offered an update.

item.title: The Best Meteor Shower of the Year Is Coming—Here’s How to Watch
item.description: The highlight of the year, the Geminids are the most active and colorful meteor shower, offering the chance to see hundreds of shooting stars every hour when they peak in mid-December.

item.title: Get ready for an AI country music explosion
item.description: When songwriter Patrick Irwin moved to Nashville last year, he was entering a lottery. Each day hundreds of sessions take place where writers create a song demo to pitch to a publisher. Publishers then share those songs with labels and managers, who may share those songs with the artists. Even if a major country star […]

item.title: UK issues £1 million fine to adult platform for failing to comply with age verification rules
item.description: AVS Group Ltd also got hit with an additional £50,000 fee for failing to respond to information requests as Ofcom strenghts its grip on Online Safety Act's enforcement.

item.title: Last chance to score the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 for its lowest-ever price at Amazon — save $100 right now
item.description: As of Dec. 4, the Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 (40mm) is discounted at Amazon to $249.99, its lowest-ever price. This is 29% off its list price of $349.99.

item.title: Grab the perfect mobile gaming gift with huge discounts on controllers from Razer and Backbone
item.description: There are a decent number of mobile controller discounts right now and any one could be a great gift.

item.title: Soupçons d’espionnage russe sur SpaceX : un cosmonaute a été exclu
item.description: Coup de théâtre pour la mission Crew-12. Le cosmonaute vétéran Oleg Artemiev est débarqué à quelques mois du décollage. Si Moscou évoque une simple mutation, plusieurs sources affirment qu'il aurait enfreint les règles de sécurité de SpaceX en photographiant des documents sensibles.

item.title: HBO Max confirmed release month for UK means Brits can finally stream the best TV show of 2025 – and season 2 starts soon
item.description: After what feels like forever, HBO Max has officially got a release window for the UK... meaning the Brits can finally stream the best TV show of 2025.
